During Setup
aosreminders.com
Stormcast Eternals Allegiance - Scions of the Storm
Set up 1 unit in the Celestial Realm for every unit you set up on the battlefield. At the end of your movement phase you can set up one or more reserve units more than 9"
from the enemy. Any units not set up before the 4th Battleround are slain.
During Hero Phase
Command Ability: Anvils of the Heldenhammer \(Stormhost\) - Heroes of Another
Age
Pick a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER unit wholly within 9" of a friendly of
a friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO, or wholly within 18" of a friendly
ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER HERO that is a general. That unit can attack with
all the missile weapons it is armed with, or make a pile-in move and attack with all of
the melee weapons it is armed with. Same unit cannot benefit more than once per hero
phase.
Knight-Incantor - Voidstorm
Once per battle, you can declare an enemy spell is automatically unbound \(do not roll
the dice\).
Spell - Stormcaller
Casting value of 7. Roll a D6 for each enemy unit on the battlefield. On a 6+ that unit
suffers D3 mortal wounds.
Spell: Knight-Incantor - Spirit Storm
Casting value of 7. Each enemy unit within 18" of the caster suffers a mortal wound. In
addition, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from run and charge rolls for enemy
units while they are within 18" of the caster.
During Movement Phase
Aetherwings - Swooping Hunters
This unit can retreat and still charge later in the same turn.
Spell: Knight-Incantor - Spirit Storm
Casting value of 7. Each enemy unit within 18" of the caster suffers a mortal wound. In

End Of Movement Phase
Stormcast Eternals Allegiance - Scions of the Storm
Set up 1 unit in the Celestial Realm for every unit you set up on the battlefield. At the
end of your movement phase you can set up one or more reserve units more than 9"
from the enemy. Any units not set up before the 4th Battleround are slain.
Vanguard-Hunters - Astral Compass
If you set up a unit that includes any models with an Astral Compass in the Celestial
Realm using the Scions of the Storm battle trait, when you set it up on the battlefield
for the first time, instead of setting it up more than 9" from the enemy, you can set it up
wholly within 6" of any edge of the battlefield, more than 7" from the enemy.
During Shooting Phase
Vanguard-Hunters - Hunter-Prime
+1 attack.
Vanguard-Hunters - Tireless Hunters
This unit can run and still shoot in the same turn.
Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows - Headshot
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Longstrike Crossbow is 6, that attack
inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends \(do not make a
wound or save roll\).
Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows - Longshot
Add 6" to the Range of this unit's Longstrike Crossbows if this unit did not move in the
movement phase of the same turn.
During Charge Phase
Aetherwings - Swooping Hunters
This unit can retreat and still charge later in the same turn.
Aetherwings - Watchful Guardians
At the start of the enemy charge phase, if this unit is wholly within 18" of a friendly unit
of VANGUARD-RAPTORS, this unit can move up to 2D6". They must finish the move
wholly within 18" of the same unit of VANGUARD-RAPTORS.
Spell: Knight-Incantor - Spirit Storm
Casting value of 7. Each enemy unit within 18" of the caster suffers a mortal wound. In
addition, until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from run and charge rolls for enemy
units while they are within 18" of the caster.
Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows - Hunting Call
If an enemy unit finishes a charge move within 1" of a friendly unit that includes a
Raptor-Prime, roll a D6 for each model in that Raptor-Prime's unit. For each 6+, the
charging unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.
Start Of Combat Phase
Knight-Incantor - Spirit Flask
Once per battle, at the start of the combat phase, you can say that this model will shatter 1, 2 or 3 spirit flasks. If you do so, each unit within 3" of this model suffers 1 mortal
wound for each spirit flask that was shattered. Units within 3" with 10 or more models suffer D3 mortal wounds for each spirit flask that was shattered instead. Allocate the
mortal wounds to this model last of all, after allocating them to any other units that are affected.
During Combat Phase
Stormcast Eternals Allegiance - Shock and Awe
Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target any unit set up this turn.
Vanguard-Hunters - Hunter-Prime
+1 attack.
End Of Combat Phase
Artifact: Anvils of the Heldenhammer \(Stormhost\) - Soulthief
Pick one of the bearer's melee weapons. At the end of the combat phase, roll a D6 for each enemy model that was allocated any wounds caused by this weapon in that
combat phase. On a 3+ that model suffers 1 mortal wound.
During Battleshock Phase
aosreminders.com
Anvils of the Heldenhammer \(Stormhost\) - No True Death
You can reroll failed battleshock tests for friendly ANVILS OF THE HELDENHAMMER
units.
Command Trait: Anvils of the Heldenhammer \(Stormhost\) - Deathly Aura
Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of
this general.
